surgical_items.title: General Surgery
surgical_items.desc: Conventional surgical techniques for the treatment of prevalent diseases (hernias, ano-orificial pathology, minor surgeries).
features: Diagnosis and treatment of ano-orificial diseases (Hemorrhoidal disease, fistulas, abscesses, fissures)

surgical_items.title: Gastrointestinal Surgery
surgical_items.desc: Surgical procedures at the digestive tract level through minimal incisions producing fewer scars, less pain, and a fast recovery.
features: Minimally invasive treatment of Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease
Minimally invasive approach for Morbid Obesity and Type II Diabetes Mellitus (Metabolic Surgery)

surgical_items.title: Minilaparoscopy
surgical_items.desc: Surgical technique in gastrointestinal diseases or hernia pathology using very fine instruments (3 mm) with minimal scars and a fast recovery.

endoscopic_items.title: Upper Endoscopy
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic procedure that allows the internal evaluation of the esophagus, stomach, and duodenum for diagnostic and treatment purposes.

endoscopic_items.title: Colonoscopy
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic procedure that evaluates the interior of the colon and rectum for the diagnosis and treatment of their diseases.

endoscopic_items.title: Duodenoscopy
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic procedure that allows evaluating the duodenum and the Ampulla of Vater for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes.

endoscopic_items.title: Endoscopic Ultrasound
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic study that allows the evaluation of the walls of the esophagus, stomach, and duodenum, as well as neighboring organs (Pancreas, Bile Ducts, Lymph Nodes, and tumor lesions).

endoscopic_items.title: ERCP
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic study that allows diagnosing and treating diseases of the bile duct and pancreatic duct.

endoscopic_items.title: Cholangioscopy
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic technique that allows direct visualization of the interior of the bile and pancreatic ducts for diagnosis and treatment.

endoscopic_items.title: Enteroscopy
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic procedure that allows the treatment of benign and malignant diseases of the small intestine.

endoscopic_items.title: Endoscopic Capsule
endoscopic_items.desc: Study that consists of ingesting an electronic device in the form of a capsule which takes photographs of the small intestine or colon for diagnostic purposes.

endoscopic_items.title: Nutritional Assistance
endoscopic_items.desc: Endoscopic placement of feeding tubes in the stomach and small intestine (jejunum), with the aim of administering medications and food.

endoscopic_items.title: Intragastric Balloon
endoscopic_items.desc: Consists of endoscopically placing a water-filled balloon for 1 year with the aim of promoting weight loss in the obese patient.

profile.title: Experience and Technology at the service of your health
profile.p1: With more than a decade of experience in Advanced Endoscopy and Laparoscopy, I am committed to providing accurate diagnoses.
profile.p2: Each procedure is performed with dedication, always prioritizing your health and well-being with minimally invasive techniques.
profile.p3: My mission is to provide you with a high-quality, personalized, and reliable medical service.
